programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: Jack Hunter percebe que o túmulo do faraó estar vazio, exceto por uma moeda romana, significa que o tesouro foi saqueado para Roma, mas mais tarde provavelmente transferido para a nova capital bizantina, Constantinopla.

programme.title: Missão Quase Impossível, (2010, Late Night Comedies)
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espião Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difícil até hoje: cuidar dos três filhos de sua namorada, que não gostaram muito do namorado de sua mãe.

programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: O jovem arqueólogo Jack Hunter planejou apenas tirar uma foto de uma tabuinha cuneiforme da outrora insuperável metrópole mesopotmiana Ugarit, na atual Síria, mas é pego e tem que roubá-la de um museu particular na França.

programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: O aventureiro Jack Hunter sai em busca de uma tumba lendária, encontrando perigosos velhos adversários e ainda mais perigosas velhas chamas ao longo do caminho.

programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Adventure)
programme.desc: Jack Hunter percebe que o túmulo do faraó estar vazio, exceto por uma moeda romana, significa que o tesouro foi saqueado para Roma, mas mais tarde provavelmente transferido para a nova capital bizantina, Constantinopla.

programme.title: Missão Quase Impossível, (2010, Late Night Comedies)
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espião Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difícil até hoje: cuidar dos três filhos de sua namorada, que não gostaram muito do namorado de sua mãe.

programme.title: Em Nome do Rei: A Última Missão, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um assassino moderno, é contratado para uma tarefa final: sequestrar as filhas de uma Família real européia. As coisas vão à loucura quando descobrimos que ele escolheu voltar à Idade Média e trazer de volta a ordem a um reino no caos.

programme.title: Mee-Shee: O Gigante das Aguas, (2007, Children)
programme.desc: A viagem para Disney foi cancelada. Mac e seu pai, Sean, vão a uma cidade com um lago. Eles encontrarão aventuras emocionantes que superam a Disney, com perseguições e bandidos. Uma história de amizade para toda a família.

programme.title: Ilha dos Dinossauros, (2014, Children)
programme.desc: Dois meninos se encontram em uma ilha que existe além do tempo, onde são cercados por dinossauros e outros fenômenos estranhos.

programme.title: Os Meninos Voadores, (2008, Children)
programme.desc: Dois meninos de uma pequena cidade testam sua coragem quando acidentalmente escapam a bordo de um avião pertencente à máfia.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China e na América, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Jet Li é Wong Fei-Hong, herói chinês que vai à América, é salvo por índios e luta contra a exploração de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: Vale da Luta, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Depois que a jovem Tori é encontrada morta, sua irmã Windsor inicia uma investigação por conta própria e descobre que ela lutava para pagar suas despesas.

programme.title: Dragões para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie é contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as águas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.​

programme.title: Máscara Negra, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um herói mascarado.

programme.title: Liga dos Deuses, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: A história conta como o Rei Zhou de Shang se torna um tirano devido às astúcias de Daji, um espírito vixen que está disfarçado como uma de suas concubinas.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da máfia japonesa suspeita de ser vítima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: O Monge à Prova de Balas, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história em quadrinhos "underground", ele conta a história de um monge tibetano imortal -Chow- que se torna o mentor de um jovem menino de rua -Scott-, a quem ele ensina a proteger um velho pergaminho que o monge cuidou durante anos.

programme.title: Alfie, (1966, Romance)
programme.desc: Alfie is not really a bad sort. It’s just that he has this overwhelming desire for the opposite sex. You might say that “birds’ are irresistible to him, sort of second nature.

programme.title: It's A Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World, (1963, Screwball)
programme.desc: Spencer Tracy leads a hilariously zany cast of Hollywood's greatest comedians (including Milton Berle, Sid Caesar, Ethel Merman and Mickey Rooney) as eight vacation-bound motorists set off on a mad-cap, side-splitting race to find a stolen fortune!

programme.title: The Pink Panther, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this riotously funny farce, Peter Sellers introduced the world to Jacques Clouseau, the clumsiest Inspector ever to trip over a case, who is out to stop the notorious Phantom (David Niven) from stealing the priceless Pink Panther diamond!

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark, (1964, Comedy)
programme.desc: Peter Sellers and Elke Sommer star in this successful sequel to The Pink Panther in which Inspector Clouseau tries to prove a beautiful parlor maid is innocent of killing her chauffer lover.

programme.title: The Return of the Pink Panther, (1975, Comedy)

programme.title: The Pink Panther Strikes Again, (1976, Comedy)

programme.title: Irma La Douce, (1963, Screwball)

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)

programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: Proof, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: Oscar-winners Gwyneth Paltrow and Anthony Hopkins star in this powerful story of a young woman haunted by her father's past and the shadow of her own future. Based on the Pulitzer Prize-winning play, PROOF also stars Jake Gyllenhaal and Hope Davis.

programme.title: Jack and Jill vs. The World, (2010, Romance)
programme.desc: Jack is a slick N.Y.C. advertising executive. Jill is a hopeless romantic with a fiery personality. Opposites attract, and together they author their own manifesto of "rules to live by.” But Jill betrays Jack by violating rule one - Be Honest.

programme.title: Best Men, (1999, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Luke Wilson and Sean Patrick Flannery star in this hilarious action-comedy wherein Drew Barrymore is a young woman determined to have the perfect wedding day, despite the fact that the groomsmen have decided to rob the local bank.

programme.desc: Truman doesn’t realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.title: Bull, (2020, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Kris is forced to help her neighbor, an ex-bull rider scraping by on the Texas rodeo circuit.

programme.title: The Jade Pendant, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: The Old West becomes a battleground for power and revenge in this gripping epic based on true events. A young Chinese woman, Ying-Ying, finds herself on a boat to America after escaping the clutches of a bad arranged marriage.

programme.title: 17 Miracles, (2011, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: The pioneer trek across the plains of the Mormon pioneers.

programme.title: Ephraim's Rescue, (2013, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: By listening to and following his heart, Ephraim Hanks finds his way in life and eventually provides relief and rescue to the suffering Martin Handcart Company. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: A self-assured American sharpshooter moves to Australia in search of employment and finds work for a despotic land baron in the Australian outback.

programme.title: Day of the Outlaw, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: Two rival cattlemen forget their differences to fight six outlaws who take over the isolated Western town.

programme.title: Another Man, Another Chance, (1977, Action)

programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over humans' bodies and erasing their minds, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about most, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Bad Ass 2: Bad Asses, (2014, Action)

programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Joey has no monsters to defend with! Joey's luck has run out, so it's time for him to rely on skill!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the critical Battle City showdown with the fate of the world at stake: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! If Yami Yugi loses, Yugi is taking a permanent vacation into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik proves his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi's cards can withstand its assault, but a gift from Kaiba may turn the duel around…

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Yugi at the end of his ropes and the maniacal Marik waging all-out war, can Marik's oldest friend reach Marik in time to help him come to his senses before his insanity overwhelms him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Téa and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian God Cards are stolen! A terrifying new villain emerges! Real monsters begin to appear around the world! Can Yugi and the gang discover how these strange events are connected before the planet is destroyed?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters at once, but each creature receives a power boost from Orichalcos's malevolent energies! Yugi better find a way to protect himself against Gurimo's horde!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse! Both Earth and the monster domain must unite and fight against the largest terror they have ever faced!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they're asked for help from a one-eyed former foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Will Kaiba discover the secret behind Pegasus's strategies before he loses his soul, just like he did on his first trip to Duelist Kingdom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only does Alister's fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba's monsters! Will Alister get his revenge, or will Kaiba get aid from the monster domain?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai's back to help Yugi take down Dartz and save the world from annihilation... or is a topsy-turvy twist in the works?

programme.title: A penguin zombie starts acting an awful lot like Sanji, Nami continues running for her life, and Robin and Franky buy some time by blowing up a bridge!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: CHIVALRY REMAINS! THE TRAITOROUS ZOMBIE PROTECTS NAMI

programme.title: Nami gives love advice to a zombie, Luffy finds himself face-to-face with Gecko Moria, and Robin gets caught in spooky spider web. Things look bleak for the Straw Hats until their skeleton friend lends a hand!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: APPEARING FROM THE SKY! THAT MAN IS THE HUMMING SWORDSMAN!

programme.title: Brook strikes the final blow in his battle with the spider monkey, Gecko Moria's devious plan is revealed, and Luffy's escape attempt leads to the loss of something he can't live without!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S EMERGENCY SITUATION! THE ULTIMATE SHADOW'S DESTINATION!

programme.title: Brook tells Franky and Robin the secret to slaying zombies, and Gecko Moria reveals the terrifying monster that will be the recipient of Luffy's shadow!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE WARRIOR KNOWN AS THE "DEVIL"!! THE MOMENT OF OARS' REVIVAL

programme.title: Luffy's shadow is forced into the body of a monster, Usopp and Chopper get incinerated, and Nami is kidnapped by a zombie who wants to make her his wife!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: AWAKENING AFTER 500 YEARS!! OARS OPENS HIS EYES!!

programme.title: Gecko Moria's minions struggle with the burden of feeding a giant zombie brought to life by Luffy's shadow. Meanwhile, Brook flashes back to a battle that almost cost him his beloved afro!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A BELIEF WORTH BEGGING TO LIVE FOR!! BROOK DEFENDS HIS AFRO

programme.title: The freshly-revived trio of Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji discover that their shadows are missing, and Franky relates Brook's story about a promise he made to a very special whale!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A MAN'S PROMISE NEVER DIES!! TO THE FRIEND WAITING UNDER THE DISTANT SKY

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats flash back to the heartbreaking story of Laboon the abandoned whale, and Brook's battle with the zombie samurai reveals the reason behind his intense afro love!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I SWEAR TO GO SEE HIM!! BROOK AND THE CAPE OF PROMISE

programme.title: Luffy sets out to regain his shadow and convince Brook to join the crew. Meanwhile, Sanji races to stop Nami's zombie wedding before it's too late!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FOOD, NAMI AND SHADOWS!! LUFFY'S ENRAGED COUNTERATTACK

programme.title: Usopp's naturally negative personality makes him the only Straw Hat who stands a chance against Perona's depressing army of ghosts, and Chopper prepares to do battle against his hero, Dr. Hogback!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: USOPP'S THE STRONGEST? LEAVE ANYTHING NEGATIVE TO HIM

programme.title: When Brook is overmatched by the zombie samurai, Zoro steps in to help the skeleton get his shadow back. Meanwhile, Luffy prepares for a battle with Gecko Moria, and Sanji interrupts an undead wedding!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE GENERAL ZOMBIES ARE DOWN IN A FLASH!! OARS FEELS LIKE AN ADVENTURE!!

programme.title: Despite his furious attempts, Luffy struggles to land a blow against Gecko Moria, but Sanji fares much better in his passionate attempt to defeat Nami's beastly abductor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BLAZING KNIGHT SANJI!! KICK DOWN THE FAKE WEDDING

programme.title: Sanji takes a beating when his opponent suddenly turns invisible, Luffy finally manages to land a blow in his battle with Gecko Moria, and Usopp uses fire to ward off a zombie bear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A CLEAR-CLEAR HISTORY? SANJI'S STOLEN DREAM

programme.title: After getting the stuffing beat out of him by a zombie teddy bear, Usopp summons his sharp-shooting alter ego to help him discover the secret to defeating Perona!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SAVE ME, HERO!! MY ENEMY IS THE IMMORTAL PRINCESS

programme.title: Usopp reaches deep into his devious bag of tricks to even the odds in his battle with Perona. Meanwhile, Luffy can't lay a finger on Gecko Moria, and a zombie is less than gentlemanly in his battle with Robin!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: PERONA IS TERRIFIED!! USOPP AND UNTRUTHFUL SHARE THE SAME "U"

programme.title: While Franky and Brook watch in awe, Zorro and the zombie samurai wage a sword-slinging battle the likes of which the world has never seen before!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SLASHES DANCING ON THE ROOFTOP!! SHOWDOWN: ZORO VS. RYUMA

programme.title: Chopper can no longer contain his fury over Dr. Hogback's evil treatment of his zombie slaves. Meanwhile, Luffy prepares to face the zombie who's wearing his shadow!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: CHOPPER IS FURIOUS!! HOGBACK'S EVIL MEDICAL PRACTICES

programme.title: Moria's mansion is reduced to ruins as the zombie with Luffy's shadow stalks the Straw Hats! As the walls come tumbling down, Chopper puts the hurt on Hogback, and Nami vanishes right before Sanji's eyes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OARS ROARS! COME OUT, STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: One by one, the Straw Hats attack Oars, but the monstrous zombie appears too powerful to be defeated. Luffy's got his sights set on Moria, but he'd better hurry if he wants to save his crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY IS THE ENEMY! THE ULTIMATE ZOMBIE VS. THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Nami wakes up just in time to find out she's about to marry a zombie, but the special occasion is interrupted by very jealous warthog!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: YOU'RE GOING DOWN, ABSALOM!! NAMI'S LIGHTNING ATTACK OF FRIENDSHIP!!

programme.title: Nami attempts to track down some missing treasure, Brook searches the kitchen for a mystery ingredient, and a heroic team effort topples Oars!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KNOCK HIM DOWN!! SPECIAL ATTACK: STRAW HAT DOCKING?

programme.title: Nami has a horrifying run in with Bartholomew Kuma, Perona becomes the latest lady to vanish, and Chopper, Franky, and Usopp team up to strike a blow against Oars!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SILENT ASSAULT!! THE MYSTERIOUS VISTOR, "TYRANT" KUMA

programme.title: Kuma has an upsetting message for Moria, Luffy loses track of his intended target, and Zoro attempts to harness the power of a new sword during his battle with Oars!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OARS + MORIA / THE MOST HEINOUS COMBINATION OF BRAINS AND BRAWN

programme.title: Brook arrives with the salt needed to stop Oars, but the monster shows off some special new abilities. Deep in the forest, Luffy makes some new friends who help him power up!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SECRET PLAN TO TURN THE TABLES / NIGHTMARE LUFFY MAKES HIS APPEARANCE

programme.title: Brook joins the fight as the Straw Hats valiantly try to hold off Oars and Moria until Luffy returns. Unfortunately, even their combined powers are no match for these evil enemies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRAW HAT CREW GETS WIPED OUT / THE SHADOW-SHADOW'S POWERS IN FULL SWING

programme.title: Oars and Moria ruthlessly pummel the badly beaten Straw Hats. The situation looks bleak until the shocking arrival of Nightmare Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE INCREDIBLE BATTLE STARTS! LUFFY VS. LUFFY

programme.title: After Luffy's shadow power disappears, he'll need help from rest of the Straw Hats to land a devastating finishing blow in his battle against Oars.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE END OF THE BATTLE IS NIGH! POUND IN THE FINISHING MOVE

programme.title: Moria gobbles up every shadow in sight to power up for a final showdown with Luffy. Can the Straw Hats save the day before the dawn reduces them all to ashes!?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: OUR BODIES VANISH! THE MORNING SUN SHINES ON THE NIGHTMARISH ISLAND!

programme.title: The battle between Luffy and Moria reaches its epic end, and the gargantuan shadow of the towering brute known as Kuma causes a panic on the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: NOT OUT OF DANGER YET! ORDERS TO ANNIHILATE THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Kuma is ordered by the World Government to obliterate every living being on the island, but the Straw Hats – battered as they may be – refuse to go down without a fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: IT REPELS EVERYTHING / KUMA'S PAW-PAW POWER

programme.title: A heated confrontation occurs between Zoro and Sanji as they argue over who will sacrifice themselves to save Luffy, but Kuma's final attack may be worse than death.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE PAIN OF MY CREWMATES IS MY PAIN / ZORO'S DESPERATE FIGHT

programme.title: Sanji learns the truth about Zoro's amazing sacrifice, and Brook is overjoyed to learn that Laboon is still alive and doing fine!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE PROMISE FROM A DISTANT DAY / THE PIRATES' SONG AND A SMALL WHALE

programme.title: A flashback reveals the story of how Laboon and Brook became friends – and the promise that was made at the hour of their sorrowful parting of the ways.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BROOK'S PAST / A SAD FAREWELL WITH HIS CHEERFUL COMRADE

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko informs Lupin that fine quality diamonds from South Africa are stored in a safe of a global syndicate and importer of diamonds. Lupin makes his way as a worker in the boiler room, and steals the loot of diamonds.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds out about the jewel "Poison Trio" of the Borges family and decides to steal it after Fujiko goads him. Galdan, the nephew of Lucricia greets Lupin, and tells him that elderly Lucricia had been arrested and must be broken out of jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes on a safe-cracking rampage and rakes in 10 million francs. He needs the money to purchase the world's only rare Gold Butterfly at an auction. But Lupin drops the 10 million francs while on the run…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin scopes a jewelry museum where the billion-dollar gem Cleopatra's Tear is displayed. But Lupin can't get to it because the display case is secured by high-voltage electricity.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: No thief has ever succeeded in stealing the secret gem of Pompeii's nunnery; it's guarded by venomous snakes. Even Arsene Lupin gave up on it, since he hates snakes. But Lupin takes on the challenge. Will Lupin succeed? And what kind of secret gem is it?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though the tycoon Steel had replaced all his bodily organs with artificial organs to live, he's told that he only has a week to live. There is only one way he could prolong his life, which is to receive a brain transplant and he wants Lupin's Brain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous gourmand and field mice scientist Salmon Whitney is also known as being the chairman of a Canadian diamond mining operation. Lupin is after his diamonds, which will go on auction in Paris.
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Runs and the Pig Rolls

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Coaxed by Fujiko, Lupin decides to steal the diamond chandelier at the Kremlin Palace. He disguises himself as Zenigata and infiltrates the palace, but government police soldier Natasha captures him and throws him in the slammer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: England's Lord Weather provokes Lupin with a bet, and dares him to steal Red Arrow away from him. Lupin takes the challenge as it's a matter of pride, but Jigen wants no part of it because he and Weather are gambling buddies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Miami Bank is on the verge of bankruptcy after its last customers closed their accounts. The bank manager Garlic devises a plan to revive the bank, and drums up news that his bank had been raided by Lupin; he also asks Lupin to really do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Thief brothers Nanja-Monja have been in the business since the days of Arsène Lupin; they decide to induct Lupin as a tourist attraction for the Republic of Karchina. But first they abduct Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: Hair Breadth Rescue Operation for Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko joins Lupin and gang who are camping and cooking Sukiyaki; people are hunting Fujiko, and gunfire is exchanged. Fujiko gets captured and Lupin's Sukiyaki meal gets ruined, but he finds an atomic bomb's detonator plug inside of the Sukiyaki bowl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Genius prodigy boy Romanoff has ten doctorates from Russia's Public Academy; blustering that no greater than he exists, he challenges Lupin. Since Fujiko is involved, Lupin cannot back down; what will become of this challenge?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko is the model for Norway's famous sculptor Vingel's crystal mermaid statue; she believed when he said he would give it to her the day it was finished, but Vingel gets greedy and sells it to the mayor of the city of Bergen instead.
programme.sub-title: The Mermaid That Disappears in the Midnight Sun

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin tries to steal a bunch of diamonds from a diamond auction. But the auction auditorium is at the Marine Tower above a skyscraper, and there is only one transparent elevator to get there.
programme.sub-title: The Target is Five Hundred and Fifty Five Meters Away

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin heads to Mecca to steal Mohammed's treasure. But first he is confronted by Patra Lawrence, the grandaughter of the Lawrence of Arabia, who is the chief of Mecca's special police headquarters; how will Lupin steal the treasure now?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Fujiko instigates Lupin and friends to go steal; this time their target is the Jovich Piano installed in a music hall built around it. There is no door large enough in the hall to carry the piano out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the shipment of raw diamonds that arrived at a harbor in Nice; he sneaks into the storage in the middle of the night but Zenigata was on to him. Lupin escapes with the help of Jigen and Goemon, but Fujiko gets captured.
programme.sub-title: To Arrest Lupin, the Mission at Highway

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A month ago, president Gappolini of one of the world's top five trading companies, had died. Gappolini bequeathed a will saying that the heir to the company presidency will be the world's finest sharpshooter and Jigen is a target.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's said that immense sums of money confiscated from organized crime get transported to a Swiss bank by ICPO, once a year. Naturally, Lupin wants a piece of that action, so he steals the armed security vehicle along with Zenigata in it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The city of Grand Hexagon lies at the border of France and Spain; the city is designed with six sides. But at the center of the city is Raika Bank storing fifty tons of gold bullion; an alarm will go off if even one bullion is missing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Robot soldier Lamda flies above the sky of Tokyo, raids a jewelry store. Its creator, professor Oyamada's daughter Maki and Lupin say that it was just a show to demonstrate the inhumanity of robots.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd: Voyage to Danger
programme.desc: Someone sent orders to assassinate Lupin. Will he survive or die trying!?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return, (1999, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army, when the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Stealth, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: From the director of XXX and The Fast and The Furious comes an exhilarating epic blockbuster starring Josh Lucas, Jessica Biel and Academy Award® Winner Jamie Foxx (Best Actor, RAY, 2004). rated -PG-13

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Drama)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: Silver Canyon, (1951, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry and Pat Buttram are sent by the cavalry to bring in raiders who are interfering with supply lines. Gene traces them to a small Army outpost where the outlaws set out to ravage the town.

programme.title: The Blazing Sun, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry and pal Mike hunt bank robbers Al Bartlett and Trot Lucas. To throw off his pursuers, Bartlett kills his own twin brother and Lucas hoping that Gene and the Sheriff will believe him dead.

programme.title: Riders Of The Whistling Pines, (1949, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry believes he has accidentally shot a man, but learns that the guilt lies with men trying to stop a destructive moth infestation. Will modern chemicals be used to save the day, against Gene?

programme.title: Mule Train, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: When natural cement is discovered by two prospectors, one is murdered during a claim jump attempt. Marshal Gene Autry befriends the lone prospector and tries to help him promote his cement discovery.

programme.title: Canadian Pacific, (1949, Drama)
programme.desc: A surveyor for the Canadian Pacific Railroad must fight fur trappers who oppose the building of the railroad by stirring up Indian rebellion.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: The Missouri Breaks, (1976, Crime)
programme.desc: Marlon Brando and Jack Nicholson ignite the screen in this rousing story of a wealthy Montana rancher who hires a professional killer to track down a gang of horse thieves.

programme.title: Stagecoach, (1939, Drama)
programme.desc: Dallas is a woman with a past who has been driven out of town by the high-minded ladies of the community. Lucy Mallory is the wife of a cavalry officer stationed in Lordsburg, and she's determined to be with him.

programme.title: Mean Girls, (2004, Screwball)
programme.desc: Cady thinks she understands "survival of the fittest." However, the law of the wild takes a whole new meaning when the homeschooled 15-year-old enters public high school for the first time.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Across the Universe, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: A love story about a British boy and an American girl set against the backdrop of the social upheaval of the 1960s.

programme.title: Save The Last Dance, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: Sara is a small-town girl who dreams to become a world-class ballerina. But when her mother suddenly dies, she must abandon her plans and join her estranged father on Chicago's South Side.

programme.title: Little Nicky, (2000, Screwball)
programme.desc: When Satan reneges on his plans to retire, two of his three heirs leave Hell to gather enough souls to vote the Prince of Darkness out of office. But Satan sends his youngest—and nicest—son, Little Nicky, to bring the other two home.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Mean Girls, (2004, Screwball)
programme.desc: Cady thinks she understands "survival of the fittest." However, the law of the wild takes a whole new meaning when the homeschooled 15-year-old enters public high school for the first time.

programme.title: Paid in Full, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: After going under cover at Padre, Morgan and Madison find themselves back at odds trying to do what's best for Mo while struggling to accept their new lives under the watchful eye of Padre.

programme.title: A Espada do Imortal
programme.desc: Manji vê sua irmã mais nova ser assassinada na sua frente e começa sua vingança. Uma mulher misteriosa aparecerá diante de Manji, concedendo-lhe juventude eterna e imortalidade. Em seguida, os pais de Rin Asano são mortos por um grupo de espadachins chamado Itto ruy, e o estúdio de esgrima de seus pais é destruído. Para se vingar, ela pedirá ajuda a Manji, e os dois lutarão contra os Itto ruy.

programme.title: O Relutante Fundamentalista
programme.desc: Um jovem paquistanês se vê em um conflito entre seu sonho americano, uma crise de reféns e sua terra natal.

programme.title: Celular
programme.desc: O filme é uma história arrepiante sobre a jornada de um pai para encontrar sua esposa e seu filho. Clay Riddell se encontra em Boston e, de repente, o inferno se abre diante de seus olhos. Sem aviso prévio, a carnificina e o caos reinam. Pessoas comuns são vítimas dos atos mais vis, da destruição mais animalesca. E o apocalipse começa com a chamada de um telefone celular.

programme.title: Perdido na Fama
programme.desc: Turk Henry (Antonio Banderas) é um astro de rock com uma agenda atribulada de shows e entrevistas. Buscando um pouco de reclusão para desfrutar de bons momentos com sua esposa, Sheila (Olga Kurylenko), os dois decidem passar algumas semanas de férias no Chile. Uma excursão inocente para as floretas chilenas acabam levando ao sequestro de Sheila por um grupo de possíveis terroristas que, ironicamente, são fãs de Turk Henry.

programme.title: Cálculo Mortal
programme.desc: Niko e Tillie são dois adolescentes que engatam um romance de verão. Tudo vai bem até que o irmão do garoto aparece em cena. Problemático e envolvido com terrorismo, Marco (Scott Adkins) está prestes a colocar um novo plano em ação. Agora, cabe a Niko detê-lo para proteger aqueles a quem ama.

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Aos 16 anos de idade, Max McGrath descobre que seu corpo pode gerar a energia mais poderosa do universo, ele deve vincular-se com o único ser capaz de contenê-lo: um extraterrestre tecno-orgânico misterioso chamado Steel. Unidos como o super-herói Max Steel, os dois amigos devem combater uma ameaça alienígena e desvendar os segredos de seu passado.

programme.title: A Espada do Imortal
programme.desc: Manji vê sua irmã mais nova ser assassinada na sua frente e começa sua vingança. Uma mulher misteriosa aparecerá diante de Manji, concedendo-lhe juventude eterna e imortalidade. Em seguida, os pais de Rin Asano são mortos por um grupo de espadachins chamado Itto ruy, e o estúdio de esgrima de seus pais é destruído. Para se vingar, ela pedirá ajuda a Manji, e os dois lutarão contra os Itto ruy.

programme.title: O Relutante Fundamentalista
programme.desc: Um jovem paquistanês se vê em um conflito entre seu sonho americano, uma crise de reféns e sua terra natal.

programme.title: Celular
programme.desc: O filme é uma história arrepiante sobre a jornada de um pai para encontrar sua esposa e seu filho. Clay Riddell se encontra em Boston e, de repente, o inferno se abre diante de seus olhos. Sem aviso prévio, a carnificina e o caos reinam. Pessoas comuns são vítimas dos atos mais vis, da destruição mais animalesca. E o apocalipse começa com a chamada de um telefone celular.

programme.title: Perdido na Fama
programme.desc: Turk Henry (Antonio Banderas) é um astro de rock com uma agenda atribulada de shows e entrevistas. Buscando um pouco de reclusão para desfrutar de bons momentos com sua esposa, Sheila (Olga Kurylenko), os dois decidem passar algumas semanas de férias no Chile. Uma excursão inocente para as floretas chilenas acabam levando ao sequestro de Sheila por um grupo de possíveis terroristas que, ironicamente, são fãs de Turk Henry.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 5 Cabeças
programme.desc: Um monstruoso tubarão de cinco cabeças espalha o terror no oceano aberto antes de invadir as praias de Porto Rico, colocando em perigo a outrora pacífica ilha paradisíaca. Enquanto a criatura devora tudo em seu caminho, inclusive humanos, a polícia e a equipe do aquário se mobilizam para impedir a carnificina e salvar vidas.

programme.title: No Limite
programme.desc: Quando Jimmy encontra um pacote misterioso no porta-malas do seu último roubo, ele é levado para um violento submundo de criminosos e uma corrida contra o relógio para salvar a vida de uma menina.

programme.title: Um Verão Inesquecível
programme.desc: Quando Kathy chega ao acampamento de cavalos, ela percebe que deve lidar com Stacy, a garota má. À medida que a competição esquenta, Kathy aprende a reconhecer o valor da amizade verdadeira.

programme.title: O Destino de Grace
programme.desc: Após uma missão, uma enfermeira do exército retorna à fazenda da sua avó em uma comunidade Amish, em Ohio, onde encontra um romance inesperado e é envolvida em um misterioso assassinato.

programme.title: Meu Amigo Pé Grande
programme.desc: Depois de um acidente de bicicleta na floresta, Percy Caldwell encontra um novo amigo, Pé Grande, uma criatura de dois metros e meio de altura, que foi deslocada por um incêndio recente na floresta. Mas quando dois valentões encontram o Pé Grande, eles decidem capturá-lo e explorá-lo comercialmente. Agora cabe a Percy, Leonard e Madison resgatar o Pé Grande e devolvê-lo à sua casa.

programme.title: Nada é para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educação rígida, eles também desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, é professor e está apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, é jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, há uma coisa que sempre os manterá juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: A História de Wim de A a Z
programme.desc: Situado por volta de 1900, Apenstreken (A História de Wim de A a Z) Esta é a história do órfão Wim, que quer muito ir à escola, em vez de passar todo o seu tempo trabalhando forçadamente na fábrica da cidade. Com uma dose de esperteza e com a ajuda de um pequeno macaco, Wim encontra novos amigos, uma escola divertida e uma família amorosa.

programme.title: Tempo de Mudanças
programme.desc: Enviada para o rancho do seu pai nos EUA durante o verão, uma adolescente e seu cavalo Lucky Lass competem por uma vaga no National Youth Rodeo.

programme.title: Um Verão Inesquecível
programme.desc: Quando Kathy chega ao acampamento de cavalos, ela percebe que deve lidar com Stacy, a garota má. À medida que a competição esquenta, Kathy aprende a reconhecer o valor da amizade verdadeira.

programme.title: O Destino de Grace
programme.desc: Após uma missão, uma enfermeira do exército retorna à fazenda da sua avó em uma comunidade Amish, em Ohio, onde encontra um romance inesperado e é envolvida em um misterioso assassinato.

programme.title: Meu Amigo Pé Grande
programme.desc: Depois de um acidente de bicicleta na floresta, Percy Caldwell encontra um novo amigo, Pé Grande, uma criatura de dois metros e meio de altura, que foi deslocada por um incêndio recente na floresta. Mas quando dois valentões encontram o Pé Grande, eles decidem capturá-lo e explorá-lo comercialmente. Agora cabe a Percy, Leonard e Madison resgatar o Pé Grande e devolvê-lo à sua casa.

programme.title: Nada é para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educação rígida, eles também desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, é professor e está apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, é jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, há uma coisa que sempre os manterá juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: O Diário de Tati
programme.desc: A adolescente Tati conta, de forma divertida, todos os problemas de sua juventude ao seu diário. Desde ficar em recuperação em matemática até os esforços para conseguir fisgar Zeca, sua paixão atual.

programme.title: Billy Stone e o Medalhão Mágico
programme.desc: O arqueólogo Dr. Michael Stone procurou o medalhão perdido durante toda a sua vida, e agora seu filho Billy iniciou a busca.

programme.title: O Jogo do Abismo
programme.desc: Uma caça ao tesouro em um cruzeiro se tornará uma luta pela sobrevivência para Liu e o namorado.

programme.title: Primeira Chegada
programme.desc: Alex está flutuando inconsciente em um lago quando a luz de um OVNI de luz a salva, aumentando suas habilidades como telecinesia e poder de cura. Seu amigo Sean a ajuda. As autoridades a querem - não apenas por roubar um carro da polícia.

programme.title: Assassinatos do Passado
programme.desc: Um detetive trabalha para resolver um caso envolvendo um jovem surdo e um site de voyerismo que funciona em uma casa que pertenceu a um assassino em série.

programme.title: O Guerreiro
programme.desc: Um guerreiro traído pelo seu exército numa guerra devastadora é dado como morto e resgatado por uma princesa.

programme.title: Estranho, mas verdade
programme.desc: Uma jovem está passando pelo momento de maior complexidade em toda a sua vida: cinco anos após a morte de seu namorado ela misteriosamente ficou grávida dele. Sem nenhuma explicação de como isso ocorreu, decide procurar a família dele com a ideia de que o filho é mesmo do rapaz, mas com isso acabará descobrindo a verdade sobre tudo.

programme.title: A noite dos mortos
programme.desc: É Halloween em 1997, e também a última noite na escola para dois adolescentes skatistas, que vão deixar para trás a fase escolar e adentrar na famosa fase adulta. Mas, para um deles, Corey, alguns assuntos do passado ainda precisam ser resolvidos envolvendo um velho conhecido da infância. Para isso, os dois vão embarcar em uma viagem apavorante através de suas memórias, sonhos e medos.

programme.title: Containment
programme.desc: Vizinhos de um complexo de apartamentos acordam uma manhã e descobrem que estranhos em trajes de proteção os trancaram lá dentro. Incapazes de identificar os infectados dos saudáveis, os que estão em quarentena começam a questionar as autoridades e a atacar uns aos outros numa luta cheia de adrenalina pela sobrevivência.

programme.title: O Jogo do Abismo
programme.desc: Uma caça ao tesouro em um cruzeiro se tornará uma luta pela sobrevivência para Liu e o namorado.

programme.title: Primeira Chegada
programme.desc: Alex está flutuando inconsciente em um lago quando a luz de um OVNI de luz a salva, aumentando suas habilidades como telecinesia e poder de cura. Seu amigo Sean a ajuda. As autoridades a querem - não apenas por roubar um carro da polícia.

programme.title: O Guerreiro

programme.title: Operação Perigosa
programme.desc: Em Miami, dois traficantes em fuga montam uma operação de fraude de crédito lucrativa que logo atrai a atenção da polícia e dos principais criminosos da cidade.

programme.title: Os Gritos do Silêncio
programme.desc: A versão do jornalista americano Sidney Schanberg da Guerra do Camboja e sua amizade com um intérprete local. Cobrindo a captura de Phnom Penh, ele ganha o Pulitzer e retorna ao Oriente em busca de seu amigo.

programme.title: Quem é Morto Sempre Aparece
programme.desc: Para resolver seus problemas financeiros, um agente de viagens está de olho em um cadáver congelado, que por acaso está sendo procurado por dois assassinos.

programme.title: Acima de Qualquer Suspeita
programme.desc: C.J. Nichols (Jesse Metcalfe) é um jornalista investigativo disposto a denunciar o famoso promotor Mark Hunter (Michael Douglas), franco candidato a governador, por manipular provas em seus processos. Para isso, decide expor os perigos da evidência circunstancial, que pode levar um inocente a ser condenado, vai preso por um assassinato que não cometeu, mas seu plano começa a dar errado e a sua prisão pode ser definitiva.

programme.title: Jogo de Poder
programme.desc: Xangai, 1930. Os irmãos Lin Zihao e Fang Jie entram em uma briga de gangues para salvar a cidade dos planos conspiratórios do Sr. Tang, pai da mulher que é apaixonada por Lin Zihao e amada por Fang Jie.

programme.title: Assassinatos do Passado
programme.desc: Um detetive trabalha para resolver um caso envolvendo um jovem surdo e um site de voyerismo que funciona em uma casa que pertenceu a um assassino em série.

programme.title: Operação Perigosa
programme.desc: Em Miami, dois traficantes em fuga montam uma operação de fraude de crédito lucrativa que logo atrai a atenção da polícia e dos principais criminosos da cidade.
